# Radeon SML AI - React Frontend Integration

This React application provides a modern web interface for the Radeon SML AI system, enabling real-time interaction with the AI backend through an intuitive chat interface.

## Project Structure
- Modern React 18+ with functional components and hooks
- Material-UI for responsive design
- WebSocket/HTTP API communication with Python backend
- Real-time chat interface for AI queries
- Knowledge base visualization components
- Performance monitoring dashboard

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Implement responsive design patterns
- Follow React best practices with hooks and context
- Integrate with Radeon SML Python backend API
- Maintain clean component architecture

## Key Features
- Interactive chat interface for AI queries
- Real-time response streaming
- Knowledge source attribution display
- Query history and caching
- System status monitoring
- Safety filtering indicators
